entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Burk's Falls
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 9:21 PM EST Friday 03 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Clear, -35.3°C
entry.summary:

Visibility: 16.1 km
Humidity: 70 %

entry.title: Friday night: A few clouds. Low minus 29.
entry.summary: Clear. Becoming partly cloudy before morning. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light this evening. Low minus 29. Wind chill minus 39 this evening and minus 34 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Friday 03 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Flurries. High minus 10.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Flurries beginning in the morning. Risk of snow squalls in the afternoon. Local amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind becoming south 20 km/h near noon. High minus 10. Wind chill minus 37 in the morning and minus 20 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Friday 03 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Flurries. Temperature rising to minus 4 by morning.
entry.summary: Flurries with risk of snow squalls. Local amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind south 20 km/h becoming light after midnight. Temperature rising to minus 4 by morning. Wind chill minus 20 in the evening and minus 8 overnight. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Friday 03 February 2023
